[blockly](./blockly.md) &gt; [CollapsibleToolboxCategory](./blockly.collapsibletoolboxcategory_class.md)

## CollapsibleToolboxCategory class

Class for a category in a toolbox that can be collapsed.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class CollapsibleToolboxCategory extends ToolboxCategory implements ICollapsibleToolboxItem 
```
**Extends:** [ToolboxCategory](./blockly.toolboxcategory_class.md)

**Implements:** [ICollapsibleToolboxItem](./blockly.icollapsibletoolboxitem_interface.md)

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [expanded\_](./blockly.collapsibletoolboxcategory_class.expanded__property.md) | <code>protected</code> | boolean | Whether or not the category should display its subcategories. |
|  [registrationName](./blockly.collapsibletoolboxcategory_class.registrationname_property.md) | <code>static</code> | string | Name used for registering a collapsible toolbox category. |
|  [subcategoriesDiv\_](./blockly.collapsibletoolboxcategory_class.subcategoriesdiv__property.md) | <code>protected</code> | HTMLDivElement \| null | Container for any child categories. |
